title: Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help
OB: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 displays a help window. However, the help window closes immediately, preventing the contents from being read.
EB: If there is a defined F1 key for the change editor menu, the help window should stay open for the user to read.
SR:
1. Open the change editor menu.
2. Press F1.
